author: Simon Difford
description: The earl grey tannins balance the spice and orange in the liqueurs to make a harmonious aperitivo.
name: English Channel
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: The earl grey tannins balance the spice and orange in the liqueurs to make a harmonious aperitivo.
video.name: HOWTO make English Channel
